text: Adam Rippon made his red carpet debut at the 2018 Oscars with a bondage - themed look. The figure skater donned a leather harness and tuxedo by Jeremy Scott of Moschino when he arrived at the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood. His suit also included a white button - down and leather shoulder cutouts for a very S & M - themed look Rihanna that would likely get Rihanna's approval. To finish off the look, he added a shiny bow tie and loafers. Rippon is the first openly gay athlete to be sent to and win at the Winter Olympics. He took home the bronze medal for for figure skating at the 2018 Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang. Aside from his athletic skills, he became a fan favourite for his sense of humour and social media
